description: A bishop who despises the teachings and practices of the Vatican. He welcomes all those who wish to join him in his struggle, but shows no mercy to his enemies, ready to use any means necessary. In his conflict with the church, he gathers its enemies and uses them skillfully in battle.
taunt_2: I will show you your limits.
nervous_2: Come closer! I will put you to the test.
ally_death: Do not worry, death shapes character.
boast: Today's triumph will ignite the fire in my soul!
extra: Better a warrior in a garden than a gardener in war.
no_help_1: I will meditate on your insignificance.
no_sent: I don't care about worldly possessions
team_winning: They fear my arrival, they will seek refuge in flight.
will_attack: I will tear them down, stone by stone!
